kpi_info.title: Initial EPS Bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME.

kpi.kpi_alias: Initial EPS Bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2
